definition: mission/long-term task to which one devotes oneself/a calling
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc

sentences.english: To learn more about Carrefour's mission and Sales Manager responsibilities.
sentences.chinese: 更多地了解我公司的使命和课长的职责。

sentences.english: But make no mistake - they are there only in service of the mission.
sentences.chinese: 但是不要搞错，他们在那儿仅仅是是为了完成使命。

sentences.english: Do you feel like you were born to accomplish a special mission in life?
sentences.chinese: 你是否觉得生来是为了要完成一件生命中的特殊使命？

sentences.english: It is enough for a tree to yield one sort of fruit, and for a man to fulfil his own peculiar calling.
sentences.chinese: 人要实现他的特殊使命已有够多的工作要做了。

sentences.english: No - all these small girls -- they must build Yemen.
sentences.chinese: 而是所有的这些小女孩，这是他们的使命。

sentences.english: MissionThe mission of the EV Ministry is to spread the good news of Jesus Christ.
sentences.chinese: 福传委员会的使命是要传扬主耶稣基督救恩的好讯息。

sentences.english: USCG missions are clearly defined in 'legal authorities' by the US Congress.
sentences.chinese: 美国国会以法定形式清楚地定义了USCG的使命。

sentences.english: Whin do you think of this erection work?
sentences.chinese: 你看这项安装使命如何？

sentences.english: The new Committee, as an advisory body to the governments of the two countries, has a great responsibility and an honorable mission.
sentences.chinese: 新一届委员会责任重大，使命光荣。

sentences.english: Then, she walks away, her job done.
sentences.chinese: 然后她会走开，她的使命完成了。

sentences.english: Reading of the District Mission by LtGET James Lin, DTM.
sentences.chinese: 教育训练副总会长林义雄宣读总会使命。

sentences.english: But, America, I have never been more hopeful than I am tonight that we will get there.
sentences.chinese: 是你今晚给了我从未有过的自信，我会不辱使命。

sentences.english: The university teachers shoulder for the society raise the qualified professional personnel's important mission.
sentences.chinese: 高校教师肩负为社会培养合格专门人才的重要使命。

sentences.english: Understanding historic mission, Embodying life value and Repaying motherland by industries.
sentences.chinese: 认清历史使命，体现人生价值，谋求产业报国。

sentences.english: Having accomplished its mission, the Metrication Committee was dissolved in January 1998.
sentences.chinese: 委员会终于完成使命，并已于一九九八年一月解散。

sentences.english: She took on the mission of exterminating the apostles.
sentences.chinese: 她承接了歼灭使徒的使命。

definition: to shoulder (a burden)/to bear/to suffer (a disadvantage)
(one's) original intention, aspiration etc/(Buddhism) "beginner's mind" (i.e. having an attitude of openness when studying a subject just as a beginner in that subject would)
to be duty bound/to be one's unshirkable responsibility
to assign/to entrust (a task)/to give/to bestow
